Abadar's Flawless Scale.name: Balança Infalível de Abadar
Abadar's Flawless Scale.description: Este conjunto de mercador imaculado é considerado um instrumento divino entre os mais devotos fiéis de Abadar. Diferente das balanças comuns, esta possui apenas um prato simples para colocar objetos e calcula o valor ao invés de seu peso. Do outro lado do sustentáculo, um indicador de aço em forma de flecha aponta para vários números cravados na parte lateral da balança. Ao colocar um objeto de volume leve no prato, você pode determinar o seu valor em peças de ouro baseado em qual mercado a Balança foi feita (a maioria das balanças é feita em Katapesh ou Absalon) baseado na sua composição material e talento do artífice que produziu o objeto Por exemplo: após colocar uma pedra de gema no prato, a balança vai indicar o preço mais justo (médio, na maioria dos casos) que você pode esperar vendê-la no mercado onde a balança foi calibrada, mas a mesma não é capaz de determinar a relevância histórica da pedra ou quaisquer propriedades mágicas. Balança Infalível de Abadar pode ser calibrada para um mercado diferente performando um ritual de 1 hora nas proximidades do mercado desejado.

Abysium Chunk.description:
A blue-green metal with an eerie green luminescence, abysium radiates power that's inimical to life. Careless exposure to the material can lead to long-term damage to the immune system; as such, mining abysium is hazardous, as large quantities of the metal in an area cause all nearby creatures to become sick.

A creature carrying an abysium object is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} for a standard-grade object of light Bulk, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} for a standard-grade object of 1 Bulk or more or a high-grade object of light Bulk, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} for a high-grade object of 1 Bulk or more. This and all other sickening effects of abysium are poison effects.

Crafters can use 1 abysium chunk to create up to 6 doses of poisonous @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.sav38slFFlUVu75Z]{Abysium Powder}. Unscrupulous smiths have harnessed abysium's toxic properties to create noxious weapons and deadly substances.

All objects crafted from abysium shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.

Abysium Items

Abysium Items Hardness HP BT
Thin Items
Standard-grade 6 24 12
High-grade 10 40 20
Items
Standard-grade 10 40 20
High-grade 13 52 26
Structures
Standard-grade 20 80 40
High-grade 26 104 52

Acid Flask (Greater).name: Frasco de Ácido (Maior)
Acid Flask (Greater).description:
Este frasco cheio de ácido corrosivo causa 1 de dano de ácido, além do dano persistente de ácido e o dano de ácido de respingo listados. Muitos tipos concedem um bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

Você recebe +2 de bônus de item em rolagens de ataque. A bomba causa 3d6 de dano persistente de ácido e 3 de dano de ácido de respingo.

AtivaçãoA " alt="Single Action"> Golpear

Acid Flask (Lesser).name: Frasco de Ácido (Menor)
Acid Flask (Lesser).description:
Este frasco cheio de ácido corrosivo causa 1 de dano de ácido, além do dano persistente de ácido e o dano de ácido de respingo listados. Muitos tipos concedem um bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

A bomba causa 1d6 de dano persistente de ácido e 1 de dano de ácido de respingo.

AtivaçãoA alt="Single Action"> Golpear

Acid Flask (Major).name: Frasco de Ácido (Superior)
Acid Flask (Major).description:
Este frasco cheio de ácido corrosivo causa 1 de dano de ácido, além do dano persistente de ácido e o dano de ácido de respingo listados. Muitos tipos concedem um bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

Você recebe +3 de bônus de item em rolagens de ataque. A bomba causa 4d6 de dano persistente de ácido e 4 de dano de ácido de respingo.;

AtivaçãoA alt="Single Action"> Golpear

Acid Flask (Moderate).name: Frasco de Ácido (Moderado)
Acid Flask (Moderate).description:
Este frasco cheio de ácido corrosivo causa 1 de dano de ácido, além do dano persistente de ácido e o dano de ácido de respingo listados. Muitos tipos concedem um bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

Você recebe +1 de bônus de item em rolagens de ataque. A bomba causa 2d6 de dano persistente de ácido e 2 de dano de ácido de respingo.

AtivaçãoA alt="Single Action"> Golpear

Acid Spitter.description:
This tin clockwork lizard is activated when a creature moves adjacent to it, at which point it spits out a glob of acid. The target must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:20] saving throw or take [[/r 3d6[acid]]] damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes full damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and [[/r 5[persistent,acid]]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and [[/r 10[persistent,acid]]] damage.

Aeon Stone (Agate Ellipsoid).description:
This aeon stone allows you to cast 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury} as a divine innate spell once per day.

The resonant power causes the augury spell from the aeon stone to always succeed at the @Check[flat|dc:6] to give an answer other than "nothing."

Aeon Stone (Azure Briolette).description:
This aeon stone must be activated to provide a benefit.

Activate R envision

Trigger An enemy fails its save against a mental spell you cast using one of your spell slots

Effect You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice the spell's level until your next turn.

The resonant power grants a separate activation.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch} arcane cantrip.

Aeon Stone (Clear Quartz Octagon).description:
This clear quartz stone appears to have been smashed and then repaired by pouring molten copper into the cracks and fitting the shards back together using the copper as a sort of mortar. When a non-magical item in your possession with a value of 90 gp or less and a Bulk of 1 Bulk or less would become broken, this aeon stone automatically activates, preventing the item from breaking by restoring the item's current Hit Points to the item's maximum Hit Points. The stone then turns permanently into a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.CVTbxCY85nLoHYuw]{Aeon Stone (Dull Grey)}.

The stone's resonant power allows you to cast 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{Mending} as a divine innate spell once per day.

Aeon Stone (Dusty Rose Prism).description:
This aeon stone allows you to cast the 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield} cantrip as an arcane innate spell, surrounding yourself in pink energy.

The resonant power increases the damage prevented by your aeon stone's shield spell from 5 to 10.

Aeon Stone (Gold Nodule).name: Pedra Eônica (Nódulo Dourado)
Aeon Stone (Gold Nodule).description:
O criador de uma pedra eônica nódulo dourado escolhe um de seus idiomas conhecidos para armazenar dentro do cristal. Quando investir na pedra, você adquire a habilidade de compreender, falar e escrever nesse idioma.

O poder ressonante lhe permite conjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Compreender Idioma} como uma magia ocultista inata uma vez por dia.

Aeon Stone (Lavender and Green Ellipsoid.name: Pedra Eônica (Elipsoide Lavanda e Verde)
Aeon Stone (Lavender and Green Ellipsoid.description:
Esta pedra funciona como uma pedra eônica elipsoide lavanda clara, mas conjura@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dissipar Magia} de 8º nível com +31 de modificador de neutralização.

O poder ressonante lhe permite conjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detectar Magia} e @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Ler Aura} como magias arcanas inatas à vontade.

Aeon Stone (Pale Orange Rhomboid).description:
The first time each day you die, your vital and spiritual essences mingle together and reside within this aeon stone.

You have a limited sense of how many life forces are currently within 30 feet of the stone, which you can potentially use to determine when it's safe to call on the stone's power. At any time within the next hour after your body died, you can spend 1 minute concentrating in order to return to your body.

As long as your body is still intact, you are no longer dead- you are restored to 1 HP with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 3} conditions. You can benefit from the effects of only one pale orange rhomboid aeon stone in a given day.

The resonant power allows you to wait more than an hour to return to your body with the aeon stone; as long as the wayfinder remains on the body, your body doesn't decay and you can return at any point.

Aeon Stone (Pearlescent Pyramid).description:
While invested, this aeon stone grants the benefit of the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune to your weapons and unarmed attacks.

The resonant power grants a special activation.

Activate 1 Envision

Frequency once per minute

Effect You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} for 1 round.

Aeon Stone (Pink Rhomboid).name: Pedra Eônica (Romboide Rosa)
Aeon Stone (Pink Rhomboid).description:
Quando investir nesta pedra, você recebe 15 Pontos de Vida temporários. Se os efeitos da pedra forem suprimidos, você perde quaisquer Pontos de Vida temporários remanescentes até que os efeitos da pedra retornem. Esses Pontos de Vida temporários recarregam durante suas preparações diárias; eles não se recuperam se você investir novamente na pedra ou se investir em outra pedra eônica romboide rosa antes disto.

O poder ressonante lhe permite conjurar o truque mágico @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{Estabilizar} como uma magia divina inata.

Aeon Stone (Western Star).description:
This aeon stone must be activated to provide a benefit.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Effect You activate the aeon stone to gain the effects of a 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}.

The resonant power allows you to render all of your aeon stones and your wayfinder @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} whenever you use the activation to gain the effects of illusory disguise.

Aklys.name: Aklys
Aklys.description: O aklys é um dardo de arremesso com um gancho anexado à uma das pontas e uma corda comprida na outra. Embora aklys não estrejam disponíveis na maioria das lojas, podem ser comprados por 5 po de um vendedor especializado em arma exóticas.

Alabaster and obsidian game set.name: Conjunto de jogo de Alabastro e Obsidiana

Alacritous Horseshoes.description: Quando você afixar estas ferraduras de ferro simples aos cascos de um cavalo comum ou outro companheiro animal quadrúpede e o animal investir nelas, essa criatura recebe +1,5 metros de bônus de item em sua Velocidade em terra e +2 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo para Salto em Altura e Salto em Distância. Além disso, quando Saltar, ele pode se mover 1,5 metros mais longe se estiver saltando horizontalmente ou 90 centímetros mais alto se estiver saltando verticalmente.

Alacritous Horseshoes (Greater).description: Quando você afixar estas ferraduras de ferro simples aos cascos de um cavalo comum ou outro companheiro animal quadrúpede e o animal investir nelas, essa criatura recebe +3 metros de bônus de item em sua Velocidade em terra e +3 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo para Salto em Altura e Salto em Distância. Além disso, quando Saltar, ele pode se mover 1,5 metros mais longe se estiver saltando horizontalmente ou 90 centímetros mais alto se estiver saltando verticalmente.

Alarm Snare.name: Arapuca de Alarme
Alarm Snare.description: Você cria uma arapuca de alarme ligando um ou mais objetos barulhentos a um fio ou placa de pressão. Quando criar uma arapuca de alarme, você designa uma distância entre 30 e 150 metros na qual ela será ouvida. Quando uma criatura Pequena ou maior entrar no quadrado da arapuca, a arapuca faz um barulho alto o suficiente que pode ser ouvido por todas as criaturas na distância designada.

Alchemical Crossbow.name: Besta Alquímica
Alchemical Crossbow.description:
Esta besta pode disparar virotes infundidos alquimicamente. A estranha arma possui um suporte de metal montado no lado da haste perto do arco. Como uma ação, você pode carregar uma única bomba alquímica neste suporte; esta bomba deve ser alguma que causa dano de energia (como um fogo alquímico, frasco de ácido, frasco congelante, pedra-trovão ou relâmpago engarrafado).

Os próximos três ataques realizados com a besta causam 1d6 de dano do tipo de dano da bomba além do dano normal da besta. Se o segundo e terceiro ataques não forem realizados até 1 minuto após o primeiro ataque, a energia da bomba é desperdiçada. Estes ataques nunca causam dano de respingo ou outros efeitos especiais da bomba e não são modificados por quaisquer habilidades que adicionem ou modifiquem os efeitos da bomba.

A adição do suporte desbalanceia a arma, reduzindo seu alcance para 9 metros. Fora isto, ela funciona como uma besta leve (quando determinar dano, recarga e outras características). Criaturas utilizam sua proficiência com besta leve quando usam a besta alquímica. A besta alquímica custa 25 po.

Alchemist's Lab.name: Laboratório de Alquimista
Alchemist's Lab.description: Você precisa de um laboratório de alquimista para Manufaturar itens alquímicos durante o recesso. Um laboratório de alquimista expandido fornece +1 de bônus de tem em testes de Manufatura para criar itens alquímicos.

Alchemist's Lab (Expanded).name: Laboratório de Alquimista (Expandido)
Alchemist's Lab (Expanded).description: Você precisa de um laboratório de alquimista para Manufaturar itens alquímicos durante o recesso. Um laboratório de alquimista expandido fornece +1 de bônus de item em testes de Manufatura para criar itens alquímicos.

Aldori Dueling Sword.name: Espada de Duelo Aldori
Aldori Dueling Sword.description: Uma espada de duelo aldori é uma espada esguia de um gume com uma leve curvatura e uma ponta afiada e reforçada. Ela causa 1d8 de dano cortante. Uma espada de duelo aldori é uma arma corpo a corpo avançada de uma mão que pertence ao grupo de armas das espadas

Amaranthine Pavise.description:
This tower shield was developed by followers of Ketephys, the elven god of the hunt. It's distinct for having a central ridge, and for being made from only wood and hide. AC increases to +4 if you are using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} action.

Hardness HP BT
9 54 27

Ketephys's religious symbol, a hawk rising over a silver crescent, is painted on the hide stretched across the front of the shield. Each amaranthine pavise is blessed by Ketephysian priests to aid in liberating Tanglebriar and defeating the nascent demon lord Treerazer. While you have the shield raised, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against the innate spells and special abilities of demons. When your allies have cover from the amaranthine pavise, the circumstance bonus they gain from cover to Reflex saves against area effects also applies to Fortitude and Will saves against demons' area effects.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect Ketephys's wrath descends upon your foes. The shield casts good @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} with a DC of 27.

Ancestral Echoing.name: Eco Ancestral
Ancestral Echoing.description:
A sabedoria dos portadores pregressos desta arma flui em sua mente, amplificando a sua própria capacidade. O seu nível de proficiência com esta arma aumenta em um passo acima do seu normal, até a proficiência máxima que você possua com uma arma qualquer. Por exemplo: se possuir proficiência mestre com armas marciais e especialista com armas avançadas, a sua proficiência com uma avançada com essa runa aumenta para mestre.

Além disso, enquanto empunhar a arma do eco ancestral, você possui proficiência especialista em uma perícia Saber relevante a um ou mais dos portadores pregressos da arma. Essa perícia normalmente é o Saber de Anões, mas pode ser qualquer determinada pelO mestre de acordo com a história da arma.

Ancestral Embrace.description:
This brightly colored +4 major resilient leather armor is inscribed with a spiral that has no end or beginning. Though it is a symbol of the ancient religion of Holy Xatramba, it also serves as a religious symbol of Pharasma. When you invest the armor, you gain negative resistance 25 and can draw on the power of your ancestors. You gain an ancestry feat from your ancestry; the feat can be any level, but you must meet any other prerequisites of the feat. You lose the feat when the investment ends, and you can select a different feat each time you invest the armor again.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You use an ancestry feat that has a limited number of uses per day

Effect You gain an additional use of the ancestry feat. If you do not use it before the next time you make your daily preparations, the use is lost.

Activate f envision

Trigger You begin casting a legend lore ritual to learn legends about your ancestry or about someone of your ancestry

Effect Ancestral Embrace reduces the casting time of this ritual to 1 hour, and you don't need secondary casters for this ritual.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The armor casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ckUOoqOM7Kg7VqxB]{Avatar}, granting these specific additional abilities instead of those associated with a deity: Speed 70 feet, air walk, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain

  • Melee 1 spear (reach 15 feet, thrown 50 feet), Damage 6d6+6 piercing
  • Ranged 1 blowgun (range 120 feet), Damage 1d6+3 piercing plus 5d6 poison.

Destruction Ancestral Embrace crumbles if its wearer intentionally and knowingly kills or desecrates the remains of six generations of their family.

Ancient dragon skull etched with mystic.name: Crânio de Dragão Venerável encrustado com Selos Místicos

Anointing Oil.description:
Carried by many Knights of Lastwall, this amber-colored, fragrant-smelling oil is meant to prevent those who fall in battle from rising as undead. Applying anointing oil to a corpse casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose} on it. The effects last for 24 hours.

The oil is repugnant to the undead. An undead creature that touches a corpse treated with this oil is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the contact is broken or the oil's effect wears off.

Anointing Oil (Greater).description:
Carried by many Knights of Lastwall, this amber-colored, fragrant-smelling oil is meant to prevent those who fall in battle from rising as undead. Applying anointing oil to a corpse casts a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose} on it. The effects last for 24 hours. The funerary rites of the Knights of Lastwall sometimes include using this type of oil on their dead if they are to be buried.

The oil is repugnant to the undead. An undead creature that touches a corpse treated with this oil is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the contact is broken or the oil's effect wears off.

Antiplague (Greater).name: Antipeste (Maior)
Antiplague (Greater).description:
Ativação A (manuseio)

O antipeste consegue fortalecer as defesas do corpo contra diversas doenças. Ao beber um antipeste, você recebe +4 de bônus de item em salvamentos de Fortitude contra doenças por 24 horas; isso se aplica ao seu salvamento diário contra a progressão da doença.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Efeito: Antipeste}

Antiplague (Lesser).name: Antipeste (Menor)
Antiplague (Lesser).description:
Ativação A (manuseio)

O antipeste consegue fortalecer as defesas do corpo contra diversas doenças. Ao beber um antipeste, você recebe +2 de bônus de item em salvamentos de Fortitude contra doenças por 24 horas; isso se aplica ao seu salvamento diário contra a progressão da doença.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Efeito: Antipeste}

Antiplague (Major).name: Antipeste (Superior)
Antiplague (Major).description:
Ativação A (manuseio)

O antipeste consegue fortalecer as defesas do corpo contra diversas doenças. Ao beber um antipeste, você recebe +4 de bônus de item em salvamentos de Fortitude contra doenças por 24 horas; isso se aplica ao seu salvamento diário contra a progressão da doença.

Quando beber o antipeste, pode fazer imediatamente um salvamento contra uma doença de 14º nível ou menor que o esteja afetando. Se for bem-sucedido, você estará curado da doença.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Efeito: Antipeste}

Antiplague (Moderate).name: Antipeste (Moderado)
Antiplague (Moderate).description:
Ativação A (manuseio)

O antipeste consegue fortalecer as defesas do corpo contra diversas doenças. Ao beber um antipeste, você recebe +3 de bônus de item em salvamentos de Fortitude contra doenças por 24 horas; isso se aplica ao seu salvamento diário contra a progressão da doença.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Efeito: Antipeste}

Apotropaic Fulu.description:
Usage affixed over an entrance

This unassuming yellow paper, affixed above a door or gate, flickers in the light. Pick an alignment trait: chaotic, good, lawful, or evil. When a creature with the opposing alignment trait of the fulu (good for an evil fulu, and so on) passes through the entrance, it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:17] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}; regardless of whether they succeed, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 1 day.

Applereed Mutagen (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This gummy liquid disproportionately lengthens your legs, causing you to grow but making your movement awkward. The effect is very noticeable unless your clothes can adequately conceal it.

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks and you gain a +20 foot status bonus to your Speed. In addition, you grow one size larger, but your larger size does not have any additional effects beyond the potential change in space.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.tTBJ33UGtzXjWOJp]{Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Greater)}

Applereed Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

This gummy liquid disproportionately lengthens your legs, causing you to grow but making your movement awkward. The effect is very noticeable unless your clothes can adequately conceal it.

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks and you gain a +10 foot status bonus to your Speed. In addition, you grow one size larger, but your larger size does not have any additional effects beyond the potential change in space.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.xVAdPzFaSvJXPMKv]{Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Lesser)}

Applereed Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

This gummy liquid disproportionately lengthens your legs, causing you to grow but making your movement awkward. The effect is very noticeable unless your clothes can adequately conceal it.

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks and you gain a +15 foot status bonus to your Speed. In addition, you grow one size larger, but your larger size does not have any additional effects beyond the potential change in space.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.fYjvLx9DHIdCHdDx]{Effect: Applereed Mutagen (Moderate)}

Arboreal Wand (Rank 3).consumableSpellDescription:
Você canaliza a energia vital para curar os vivos ou ferir os mortos-vivos. Se o alvo for uma criatura viva voluntária, você recupera 1d8 Pontos de Vida dela. Se o alvo for um morto-vivo, você causa 1d8 de dano vital, com direito a um teste básico de Fortitude. A quantidade de ações que você gastar ao Conjurar esta Magia determina seus alvos, distância, área e outros parâmetros.

1 Esta magia tem distância de toque.

2 (concentração) Esta magia tem 9 metros de distância. Se você estiver curando uma criatura viva, aumente os Pontos de Vida restaurados em 8.

3 (concentração) Você dispersa energia vital em uma emanação de 9 metros. Isso tem como alvo todas as criaturas vivas e mortas-vivas que estiverem na área.

Elevada (+1) A quantidade de cura ou dano aumenta em 1d8, e a cura extra para a versão de 2 ações aumenta em 8.

Arboreal Wand (Rank 4).consumableSpellDescription:
Você canaliza a energia vital para curar os vivos ou ferir os mortos-vivos. Se o alvo for uma criatura viva voluntária, você recupera 1d8 Pontos de Vida dela. Se o alvo for um morto-vivo, você causa 1d8 de dano vital, com direito a um teste básico de Fortitude. A quantidade de ações que você gastar ao Conjurar esta Magia determina seus alvos, distância, área e outros parâmetros.

Archivist's Gaze.description:
This strange contraption slides over your eyes, supernaturally sharpening your mind. While peering through it, you can feel some entity whispering to you, telling all sorts of things about the subject of your gaze. You gain a +3 item bonus to Occultism (though some entities might grant a bonus to a different skill, as determined by your GM). In addition, when you employ an exploration tactic other than Investigating, you also gain the benefits of Investigating unless you choose not to.

When you invest the spectacles, you either increase your Intelligence score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you the higher score. This gives you additional trained skills and languages, as normal for increasing your Intelligence score. You must select skills and languages the first time you invest the item, and whenever you invest the same archivist's gaze, you get the same skills and languages you chose the first time.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect Pushing the glasses up your nose and asking the entity for help, you cause the spectacles to cast either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} or a 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language} on you. Because the entity tied to the spectacles chooses which one, the GM picks whichever spell is most immediately useful in your current situation (and chooses the most useful language each time the item casts comprehend language). The spell lasts for 1 minute.

Armbands of Athleticism.name: Braçadeiras de Atletismo
Armbands of Athleticism.description: Estas faixas de couro amarrado são decoradas com imagens perfuradas de halterofilistas musculosos e concedem ao usuário vigor e perícia para realizar exercícios atléticos. Enquanto estiverem presas nos seus braços, as braçadeiras concedem +2 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo. Além disso, sempre que você usar uma ação para Escalar ou Nadar e obtiver sucesso no teste de Atletismo, adicione +1,5 metros de bônus de item na distância movida.

Armbands of Athleticism (Greater).name: Braçadeiras de Atletismo (Maior)
Armbands of Athleticism (Greater).description: Estas faixas de couro amarrado são decoradas com imagens perfuradas de halterofilistas musculosos e concedem ao usuário vigor e perícia para realizar exercícios atléticos. Enquanto estiverem presas nos seus braços, as braçadeiras concedem +3 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo. Além disso, sempre que você usar uma ação para Escalar ou Nadar e obtiver sucesso no teste de Atletismo, adicione +3 metros de bônus de item na distância movida.

Armor of the Holy Warrior.description:
Based on the armors used by the holy warriors who served under General Arnisant in the Shining Crusade, this well-polished +2 greater resilient half plate is decorated with religious motifs and carved with sacred scripture. While wearing armor of the holy warrior, your item bonus from the greater resilient rune increases from +2 to +3; if you upgrade to a major resilient rune, the item bonus instead increases from +3 to +4. An undead that critically fails an unarmed attack against you while you wear this armor takes 1d6 positive damage.

If you are evil, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while wearing the armor. If you're undead, you also take [[/r 2d6[positive]]] damage each round that you wear the armor.

Activate 3 command, envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The armor casts the three-action version of a 6th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell.

Arrow-Catching Shield.name: Escudo Apanhador de Flechas
Arrow-Catching Shield.description:
Este escudo de madeira (Dureza 6, 24 PV, LQ 12) é entalhado com imagens de flechas emplumadas sobrepostas.

Ativação Rion"> Interagir; Gatilho Uma arma à distância Golpeia uma criatura a até 4,5 metros de você enquanto você possui este escudo erguido e o atacante ainda não rolou o ataque dele; Efeito O Golpe acionador vai na sua direção em vez do alvo normal dele. Se o Golpe atingi-lo, você recebe os efeitos da reação Bloquear com Escudo

Arrows.name: Flechas
Arrows.description: Estes projéteis são a munição para arcos. A haste de uma flecha é feita de madeira. Ela tem seu voo estabilizado por plumas em uma ponta e uma cabeça de metal na outra.

Artevil Suspension.description:
Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison}

This dried herb is known for its ability to draw toxins from the body, albeit violently. You can administer the suspension orally, Activating the item as part of the same activity you use to Treat Poison. If you succeed at your Medicine check to Treat Poison against an ingested poison, you can reduce the stage of the toxin by one stage, though this can't reduce the stage below stage 1 or cure the poison entirely. If you do, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} as its body purges the toxin. An artevil suspension doesn't work unless the poison was administered through ingestion; for instance, if a poison can be administered through either ingestion or injury and was administered through injury, the suspension won't work.

Backpack.name: Mochila
Backpack.description: Uma mochila comporta até 4 Volumes de itens. Se estiver carregando ou arrumando a mochila em vez de usando-a nas costas, o Volume dela é leve em vez de desprezível. Os primeiros 2 Volumes de itens em sua mochila não contam contra seu limite de Volume.

Backpack Catapult.description: This wooden device is worn on the back and contains a miniature catapult mounted on a retractable frame. As an Interact action, you can pull a lever to deploy or retract the catapult. As long as it remains deployed, you must hold the catapult using that hand or some of the components spill out onto the ground, just like dropping any other weapon. While deployed, the device opens and raises the catapult up over your shoulder. While retracted, the catapult and its mount slide down and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} within the device. A backpack catapult fires specialized stone spheres that are loaded into the bucket while unworn and retracted, through a sliding hatch; the reloading process takes 1 minute. To prevent misfires and accidental injury, the bucket fully encloses the stone while deployed, only opening when fired. As normal, you can't wear a backpack catapult with another backpack.

Banner of the Restful.description:
Carried by knights who expect to spend the night in the open, this simple-looking banner is accompanied by a long cross pole from which it hangs. Usually, the banner appears to be a piece of plain cloth; when activated, it automatically adopts whatever insignia the person activating it desires.

Activate 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Effect You plant the banner firmly in the ground, and a comfortable environment is created around it in a 20-foot radius. Those within the area are shielded against your choice of hot or cold temperatures, gaining the effects of 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5esP2GVzvxWsMgaX]{Endure Elements}. The area created by the banner lasts for 8 hours or until it is removed from the ground.

As part of the activation, you can choose to ward the same area with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm} spell. In addition to a mental alert for the person who Activates the banner, the alert sent by the alarm spell also includes an audible alarm with the sound and volume of a hand bell, which has the auditory trait. You choose the password as you decide to ward the area.

Barbed Vest.description:
Viciously sharp spiked chains wrap around this @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ewQZ0VeL38v3qFnN]{Studded Leather Armor} that can be used to magically harm the wearer and channel supernatural abilities without somehow tearing at the leather itself.

The barbed vest doesn't fuse to you in the usual way. It can be removed and discarded, but 1 day after doing so, you feel driven to recollect the vest at any cost until the curse is removed with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} spell.

Anytime you activate the barbed vest, its chains tighten around you, dealing [[/r 1d6[persistent,piercing]]] damage. You can remove this persistent damage as normal, but only after deactivating the item's magic as a single action.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency Once per day

Effect The barbed vest casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fq9yCbqI2RDt6Orw]{Spiritual Weapon}, summoning a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zi9ovfoRp2fMhfpO]{Spiked Chain} to fight for you.

Barricade Stone (Cylinder).description:
Activate 2 command, Interact

The ancient inhabitants of Bloodsalt crafted these magic rocks to construct defenses quickly. In its stone form, a barricade stone appears to be a simple pebble with an unnaturally geometric shape. The size and shape of the stone's final form depends on the type of barricade stone.

When you activate the barricade stone, you drop it on the ground, throw it up to 20 feet away, or sling it using a sling weapon.

Upon landing, the stone instantly and permanently expands. The stone grows to its maximum size. While normally items with the structure trait put creatures in their area inside the structure, this effect creates solid stone, so it can't be placed in an area where there are creatures. While it's likely to take some time even with the right tools, an activated barricade stone can be destroyed the same as any normal stone structure (Hardness 14, HP 56).

Type: Cylinder

When activated, this cylinder expands to a diameter of 5 feet, 10 feet, or 20 feet, depending on the command, with respective maximum heights of 80 feet, 40 feet, and 20 feet. If a dimension can't be reached due to contact with another solid surface, the cylinder ceases to grow in that direction.

You can activate the cylinder horizontally instead of vertically. If you do, the cylinder moves similarly to the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RBjyD36IrrFOwFXR]{Barricade Stone (Sphere)}, with the following changes: both DCs increase to 27, the damage increases to [[/r 6d6[bludgeoning]]] damage, and a creature that critically fails its Reflex save against the rolling cylinder gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1} condition (or increases the value of its wounded condition by 1).

Basic Crafter's Book.name: Livro Básico de Manufatura
Basic Crafter's Book.description: Este livro contém as fórmulas (página 293) para Manufaturar os itens comuns deste capítulo.

Bastard Sword.name: Espada Bastarda
Bastard Sword.description: Esta espada de lâmina larga, às vezes chamada de espada de uma mão e meia, possui um punho mais longo para que possa ser empunhada com uma mão ou usando as duas mãos para obter maior poder de corte ou perfuração.

Battle Axe.name: Machado de Batalha
Battle Axe.description: Estes machados são feitos explicitamente como armas em vez de ferramentas. Eles tipicamente possuem um peso menor, um cabo reforçado com tiras ou ferrolhos de metal e uma lâmina mais afiada, tornando-os ideais para cortar membros em vez de madeira.

Big Rock Bullet.description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

A big rock bullet is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a big rock bullet transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes [[/r 4d6[bludgeoning]]] damage on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes [[/r 2d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Creatures with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uG0Z8PsyZtsYuvGR]{Catch Rock} reaction can use it against a big rock bullet.

Big Rock Bullet (Greater).description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

A big rock bullet is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a big rock bullet transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes [[/r 8d6[bludgeoning]]] damage on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes [[/r 4d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Creatures with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uG0Z8PsyZtsYuvGR]{Catch Rock} reaction can use it against a big rock bullet.

Big Rock Bullet (Major).description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

A big rock bullet is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a big rock bullet transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes [[/r 12d6[bludgeoning]]] damage on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes [[/r 6d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Creatures with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uG0Z8PsyZtsYuvGR]{Catch Rock} reaction can use it against a big rock bullet.

Binding Coil.description:
Usage affixed to a weapon

Activate f envision

Trigger Your Strike with the affixed weapon damages a creature

Requirements You're an expert in Athletics.

This talisman, a bright red coil that's warm to the touch and faintly resembles a serpent, wraps entirely around your weapon. When you activate this talisman's effect, attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature you hit. On a success, rather than the normal Grapple effects, the coil instead wraps itself around the target with one end remaining attached to your weapon. Your opponent must succeed at a DC 20 Escape check to break free. The coil breaks if you move any further away from the bound opponent, but not if you move any closer.

Binding Coil (Greater).description:
Usage affixed to a weapon

Activate f envision

Trigger Your Strike with the affixed weapon damages a creature

Requirements You're an expert in Athletics.

This talisman, a bright red coil that's warm to the touch and faintly resembles a serpent, wraps entirely around your weapon. When you activate this talisman's effect, attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature you hit. On a success, rather than the normal Grapple effects, the coil instead wraps itself around the target with one end remaining attached to your weapon. Your opponent must succeed at a DC 30 Escape check to break free. The coil breaks if you move any further away from the bound opponent, but not if you move any closer.

Bitter.name: Amarga
Bitter.description: While you wear this acrid armor, any creature that Engulfs you or Swallows you Whole is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}; if it spends an action retching to reduce the sickened condition, you can attempt to Escape as a reaction.

Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: Poção de Sopro de Dragão Negro (Adulto)

Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: Poção de Sopro de Dragão Negro (Venerável)

Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: Poção de Sopro de Dragão Negro (Jovem)

Black Smear Poison.name: Veneno de Nódoa Negra
Black Smear Poison.description:
Muitos calignis usam um veneno debilitante feito de um fungo suberrâneo.

Ativação T Interagir

Salvamento Fortitude CD 16; Duração Máxima 6 rodadas; Estágio 1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 de veneno} e @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfraquecido 1} (1 rodada); Estágio 2 Como estágio 1; Estágio 3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 de veneno} e @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfraquecido 2} (1 rodada)

Blade of the Rabbit Prince.description:
This +2 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Dancing} shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.

Bladed Diabolo.name: Diabolo Lâminado
Bladed Diabolo.description: Esta arma consiste de dois discos laminados unidos por um eixo central, ele é girado por uma corda cujas pontas estão amarradas em dois bastões. O empunhador pode arremessar o diabolo como uma pedra de funda, ou balançar a corda para golpear corpo-a-corpo.

Bladed Hoop.name: Bambolê Laminado
Bladed Hoop.description: Este bambolê tem lâminas ao longo de sua orla externa. Você pode empunhá-lo com duas mãos (usando o dando de duas mãos) ou girando-o ao redor de um braço. Enquantoo você gira o bambolê, ele adquire o traço mão-livre. Colocar o bambolê para girar gasta 1 ação de interação. Em adição às restrições normais do traço mão-livre, estendido ao uso dos braços para locomoção (como @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Escalar}) interfere com o girar do bambolê força você a Largar o bambolê. Você não pode girar um bambolê debaixo d'água. Manter o bambolê girando requer uma ação livre a cada rodada, que tem o traço concentração e manipulação. Você pode manter o bambolê girando como uma atividade de exploração, mas fazê-lo por mais de 10 minutos o deixa fatigado, similar @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Trotar}.

Bladed Scarf.name: Cachecol Laminado
Bladed Scarf.description: As finas placas de metal entrelaçadas neste longo cachecol tornam este acessório de vestimenta uma arma mortal.

Blast Suit.description:
Crafted from heavy steel plating and riveted together with cunning precision, this suit of +1 resilient @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate} is specifically designed to protect against sudden explosions. This added layer of security comes at the cost of movement, however.

Activater command

Trigger You're affected by an area effect that requires a Reflex save, or you would take splash damage from a scatter weapon

Effect The blast suit locks together into a rigid bulwark, protecting you from the blast but preventing you from moving from your position under any circumstances.
You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex save against area effects, and gain resistance 5 to all damage you would normally take from area effects and scatter splash damage (this doesn't damage the blast suit). These effects persist for as long as the suit remains in the locked position. You can Interact with the suit to unlock it.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.PFtYVamw7de2cozU]{Effect: Blast Suit}

Blightburn Resin.name: Resina de Pragardente
Blightburn Resin.description: Esta seiva grudenta e endurecida é colhida de árvores infectadas por pragas de fungos e expostas a chamas abertas. Salvamento Fortitude CD 31; Latência1 minuto; Duração Máxima 6 rodadas; Estágio 18d6 de dano de veneno (1 rodada); Estágio 210d6 de dano de veneno (1 rodada); Estágio 3 15d6 de dano de veneno (1 rodada) Ativação A Interagir.

Bloodhound Mask (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 8 hours

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent with a 60 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +3 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.MI5OCkF9IXmD2lPF]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Greater)}

Bloodhound Mask (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 10 minutes

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent with a 15 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +1 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.S4MZzALqFoXJsr6o]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)}

Bloodhound Mask (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 1 hour

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent a 30 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +2 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.wFF0SZs1Hcf87Kk1]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)}

Bloodletting Kukri.name: Kukri de Sangria
Bloodletting Kukri.description: Este kukri +1 impactante possui uma lâmina carmesim que brilha estranhamente sob luz brilhante. Em um acerto crítico, o kukri causa 1d8 de dano persistente de sangramento. Se o alvo não possuir dano persistente de sangramento quando você atingi-lo com um acerto crítico, você também recebe 1d8 Pontos de Vida temporários.

Bloodthirsty.name: Sedenta por Sangue
Bloodthirsty.description:
Usage etched onto a slashing or piercing melee weapon

The magic in this rune sings in time with your attacks and coaxes you into finishing your opponent. When you critically hit a target that's taking persistent bleed damage, your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Activate r envision

Trigger You reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with the weapon

Effect You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to twice the creature's level. These Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Blowgun.name: Zarabatana
Blowgun.description: Este tubo longo e estreito é usado para disparar dardos de zarabatana, exigindo apenas o poder de um sopro exalado com força.

Blowgun Darts.name: Dardos de Zarabatana
Blowgun Darts.description: Estes dardos leves e finos são tipicamente feitos de madeira de lei e estabilizados com penas ou pelos. Eles frequentemente são ocos para que possam ser usados para inocular venenos.

Bo Staff.name: Bo
Bo Staff.description: Este cajado forte, porém esguio, é estreitado nas pontas e bem balanceado. É feito para ser uma arma ofensiva e defensiva.

Body Recovery Kit.description:
This small silver tin is filled with a herb-infused salve and a shroud of fine silk fabric. The salve smells of lavender and hyssop and is waxy to the touch. The shroud, made of spun silk, can a hold a Medium or smaller creature.

If you apply the salve and shroud to a creature that died within the past 3 days, a process which normally takes 1 hour, it slows the decomposition process, allowing a creature to be brought back to life with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} up to 1 week after its death.

Bola.name: Boleadeira
Bola.description: Esta arma arremessável consiste de pesos amarrados na ponta de longas cordas, que podem ser usados para causar dano contundente em inimigos ou amaranhar suas pernas.

Bolts.name: Virotes
Bolts.description: Mais curtos do que as flechas tradicionais, mas tendo construção similar, virotes são a munição usadas por bestas.

Book of Lost Days.description:
This massive tome's yellowed pages curl at the edges, and the letters on its face and spine are too worn to be read. When you open the book, it always opens to a page that seems to perfectly answer the question you had in mind, but reading more than a few lines causes your head to swim alarmingly.

Activate 1 hour (envision, Interact)

Requirements You aren't drained

Effect You open the book while trying to learn information about any topic. The Book of Lost Days permits you to view another's memory, which contains information about that subject commensurate to rolling a total of 40 to Recall Knowledge about the topic, with additional context provided on a success or critical success.

The price for this knowledge is the memory of a day in your past, and the vitality of a day in your future. You lose the memory of that day completely, and the total of all the knowledge you learned on that date is added to the book's repository of information. The book, not you, chooses which memories are taken, preferring days with concentrated emotional resonance, and thus tends to steal significant life moments. This loss affects only your memories; it has no effect on your level, class, feats, or other character choices.

Your natural lifespan is also shortened by 1 day. The loss of this life energy causes you to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}. You can't reduce the drained condition for 2 days, after which you can recover normally from the condition.

Creatures have occasionally managed to use the Book of Lost Days not to gain others' knowledge but to wipe their minds clean of painful memories or deadly secrets. Their memories aren't destroyed but merely stored in the book, where someone else might later retrieve them.

Boots of Bounding.name: Botas de Ressalto
Boots of Bounding.description: As solas elásticas destas botas de couro resistente amortecem seus pés e deixam cada passo mais leve. Estas botas concedem +1,5 metros de bônus de item em sua Velocidade e +2 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo para Salto em Altura e Salto em Distância. Além disso, quando você usar a ação Saltar, você pode se mover 1,5 metros a mais se estiver saltando horizontalmente ou 90 centímetros mais alto se estiver saltando verticalmente.

Boots of Bounding (Greater).name: Botas de Ressalto (Maior)
Boots of Bounding (Greater).description: As solas elásticas destas botas de couro resistente amortecem seus pés e deixam cada passo mais leve. Estas botas concedem +3 metros de bônus de item em sua Velocidade e +3 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo para Salto em Altura e Salto em Distância. Além disso, quando você usar a ação Saltar, você pode se mover 1,5 metros a mais se estiver saltando horizontalmente ou 90 centímetros mais alto se estiver saltando verticalmente.

Boots of Dancing.name: Botas de Dança
Boots of Dancing.description: Estas botas funcionam como Botas Élficas Maiores, mas reagem descontroladamente à grandes esforços físicos. Enquanto você estiver usando as botas, a magia ativa sempre que você tentar um teste de Atletismo ou Andar até o fim de sua movimentação mais de uma vez em uma única rodada durante um encontro. As botas conjuram uma @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Jvyy6oVIQsD34MHB]{Dança Incontrolável} de 8º Nível em você, e você falha automaticamente em sua jogada de salvamento. Uma vez que a maldição é ativada, as botas se fundem à você.

Bort's Blessing.name: Benção de Bort
Bort's Blessing.description: Este elo de cobre ornamentada possui um pequeno rubi no centro flanqueado por um par de runas enânicas. O usuário do anel ganha a habilidade de compreender, ler e falar um idioma comum à sua escolha, selecionado a cada manhã como parte de suas preparações diárias. Além disso, o usuário recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Diplomacia para Impressionar.

Bottled Sunlight (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mirrored bottle contains various chemicals dissolved in two immiscible solvents. Shaking the bottle induces chemical reactions that cause it to glow. For 1 hour, the bottle sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

During this hour, it can be thrown like a bomb. This requires a single action to Activate with a Strike, like other bombs, and deals the damage below. If it's not thrown within an hour of the first activation, it defuses harmlessly and is consumed.

The bomb deals 3d4 positive damage and 3 positive splash damage, as well as 3d4 additional fire damage. As normal, positive damage harms only undead and other creatures with negative healing. Undead with a particular vulnerability to sunlight (such as vampires or wraiths) take the maximum amount of positive damage from bottled sunlight ([[/r 12[positive]]] instead of 3d4). For any ability that depends on the number of weapon dice bottled sunlight has, count only the positive damage dice

Bottled Sunlight (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mirrored bottle contains various chemicals dissolved in two immiscible solvents. Shaking the bottle induces chemical reactions that cause it to glow. For 1 hour, the bottle sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

During this hour, it can be thrown like a bomb. This requires a single action to Activate with a Strike, like other bombs, and deals the damage below. If it's not thrown within an hour of the first activation, it defuses harmlessly and is consumed.

The bomb deals 1d4 positive damage and 1 positive splash damage, as well as 1d4 additional fire damage. As normal, positive damage harms only undead and other creatures with negative healing. Undead with a particular vulnerability to sunlight (such as vampires or wraiths) take the maximum amount of positive damage from bottled sunlight ([[/r 4[positive]]] instead of 1d4). For any ability that depends on the number of weapon dice bottled sunlight has, count only the positive damage dice.

Bottled Sunlight (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mirrored bottle contains various chemicals dissolved in two immiscible solvents. Shaking the bottle induces chemical reactions that cause it to glow. For 1 hour, the bottle sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

During this hour, it can be thrown like a bomb. This requires a single action to Activate with a Strike, like other bombs, and deals the damage below. If it's not thrown within an hour of the first activation, it defuses harmlessly and is consumed.

The bomb deals 4d4 positive damage and 4 positive splash damage, as well as 4d4 additional fire damage. As normal, positive damage harms only undead and other creatures with negative healing. Undead with a particular vulnerability to sunlight (such as vampires or wraiths) take the maximum amount of positive damage from bottled sunlight ([[/r 16[positive]]] instead of 4d4). For any ability that depends on the number of weapon dice bottled sunlight has, count only the positive damage dice.

Bottled Sunlight (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mirrored bottle contains various chemicals dissolved in two immiscible solvents. Shaking the bottle induces chemical reactions that cause it to glow. For 1 hour, the bottle sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

During this hour, it can be thrown like a bomb. This requires a single action to Activate with a Strike, like other bombs, and deals the damage below. If it's not thrown within an hour of the first activation, it defuses harmlessly and is consumed.

The bomb deals 2d4 positive damage and 2 positive splash damage, as well as 2d4 additional fire damage. As normal, positive damage harms only undead and other creatures with negative healing. Undead with a particular vulnerability to sunlight (such as vampires or wraiths) take the maximum amount of positive damage from bottled sunlight ([[/r 8[positive]]] instead of 2d4). For any ability that depends on the number of weapon dice bottled sunlight has, count only the positive damage dice.

Boulderhead Bock.description:
Activate A Interact

No one is sure if Gorm brews this malty ale himself, but it seems to be an off-duty favorite of the Grand Archive faction leader. The brew packs a heavy punch, and while Gorm officially discourages drinking on the job, boulderhead bock does makes the drinker more self-assured and protects them from conditions that would addle their mental faculties.

For 1 hour, you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you stunned or stupefied. However, you also become less aware of your surroundings, taking a -2 item penalty to Perception for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.2C1HuKDQDGFZuv7l]{Effect: Boulderhead Bock}

Bracelet of Dashing.description:
This jangling, silvery bracelet makes you lighter on your feet, giving you a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Activate A command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.lLP56tbG689TNKW5]{Effect: Bracelet of Dashing}

Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: Poção do Sopro de Dragão de Latão (Adulto)

Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: Poção do Sopro de Dragão de Latão (Venerável)

Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: Poção do Sopro de Dragão de Latão (Jovem)

Brass scepter with amethyst head.name: Cetro de Latão com cabeça de Ametista

Brass statuette of a bull.name: Estatueta de um Touro de Latão

Breastplate.name: Placa Peitoral
Breastplate.description: Embora chamada de placa peitoral, este tipo de armadura consiste de várias placas de armadura completa ou meia armadura (página 276) que protegem o torso, peito, pescoço e às vezes o quadril e as pernas. Ela estrategicamente concede parte da proteção da armadura completa enquanto permite maior flexibilidade e velocidade.

Brewer's Regret.description:
Activate 1 Interact

When a brewer makes a batch of something they'd rather not drink, they often boil it down; add myrrh, mugwort extract, and violet salt; and sell it to chefs looking for cheap sandwich fillings. The thick, salty sourness ruins the taste of most other food, but it also creates a strong desire to live to taste anything else. For 1 hour after consumption, you gain a +2 item bonus to saves against death and negative effects. In addition, your doomed value decreases by 1 (minimum 0). You can reduce the doomed condition with brewer's regret only once per day, and after you do, you can't reduce the doomed condition from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} spell that same day (or vice versa).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.9e6iVkPpGqJYwMyb]{Effect: Brewer's Regret}

Brilliant.name: Brilhante
Brilliant.description:
This rune causes a weapon to transform into pure, brilliant energy. The weapon deals an additional [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage on a successful Strike, as well as [[/r 1d4[good]]] damage to fiends and [[/r 1d4[positive]]] damage to undead.

On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:29] or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Activate 1 command (light)

Effect You plunge your weapon into darkness to return the light. Attempt a counteract check with a counteract level of 5 and a +19 counteract modifier to end a magical darkness effect whose area is within reach of the weapon.

Brilliant (Greater).description:
This rune causes a weapon to transform into pure, brilliant energy. The weapon deals an additional [[/r 1d4[fire]]] damage on a successful Strike, as well as [[/r 1d4[good]]] damage to fiends and [[/r 1d4[positive]]] damage to undead. Damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's fire, good, or positive resistance.

On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Activate 1 command (light)

Effect You plunge your weapon into darkness to return the light. Attempt a counteract check with a counteract level of 9 and a +31 counteract modifier to end a magical darkness effect whose area is within reach of the weapon.

Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: Poção do Sopro de Dragão de Bronze (Adulto)

Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: Poção do Sopro de Dragão de Bronze (Venerável)

Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: Poção do Sopro de Dragão de Bronze (Jovem)

Bronze bowl with wave imagery.name: Cumbuca de Bronze com desenho de uma Onda

Bronze brazier with Asmodean artwork.name: Braseiro de Bronze com entalhes de Asmodeus

Bronze chalice with bloodstones.name: Cálice de Bronze com Pedras de Sangue

Brooch of Shielding.name: Broche de Escudo Místico
Brooch of Shielding.description: Esta joia de prata e ouro é adornada com miniaturas de escudos e pode ser usada para prender um manto ou capa. O broche automaticamente absorve mísseis mágicos que tenham você como alvo. Um broche de escudo místico pode absorver 30 mísseis mágicos individuais antes que derreta e fique inútil. Às vezes, você pode encontrar um broche de escudo místico que já tenha absorvido alguns mísseis.

Bullhook (Greater).description:
A bullhook is a stout rod about 4 feet long with a blunt hook on the end. Too dull to be useful as a weapon, a bullhook is instead used to direct animals in training or in performing their tasks. A bullhook grants you a +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal while you are holding it.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You wave the bullhook to produce the effects of a fifth level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (DC 30). This spell loses the linguistic trait and can target only animals.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of command of the appropriate level.

Burr Shield.description:
This well-crafted wooden shield is covered in numerous seed pods with long spurs. You can Strike with these burrs as though they were @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.nSO0Z662LkkLfa2u]{+1 Striking Shield Spikes}.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements Your previous action was a successful Strike with the burrs

Effect One of the burrs catches on the Strike's target, inflicting [[/r 1d10[bleed]]].

Hardness HP BT
5 30 15

Caltrops.name: Estrepes
Caltrops.description: Estes espinhos de metal de quatro pontas podem causar dano aos pés de uma criatura. Você pode espalhar estrepes em um quadrado vazio adjacente com uma ação de Interagir. A primeira criatura que se mover para este quadrado deve obter sucesso em um teste de Acrobatismo CD 14 ou sofre 1d4 de dano perfurante e 1 de dano persistente de sangramento. Uma criatura sofrendo dano persistente de sangramento de estrepes sofre uma penalidade de –1,5 metros na Velocidade dela. Gastar uma ação de Interagir para tirar os estrepes reduz a CD para parar o sangramento. Uma vez que uma criatura sofra dano dos estrepes, eles ficam tão arruinados que outras criaturas que entrem no quadrado não sofrem riscos.

Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.jgaDboqENQJaS1sW]{Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit}

Candle.name: Vela
Candle.description: Uma vela acesa emite luz fraca em um raio de 3 metros.

Cane of the Maelstrom.description:
A large crystal of warpglass floats above the head of this silvery purple +3 anarchic greater striking club. If you successfully Strike a creature, the cane also affects the target with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

While you carry the cane, you hear a constant, distracting chorus of laughing, incoherent Protean whispers and sing-song voices in your mind. Blatant acts of self-indulgence or narcissism quell these whispers, from a few minutes up to a full day depending on the scope of the act, but they immediately return when you use the artifact's powers. The gradually rising chorus eventually drives away rational thought and renders the cane's owner insane, even if staved off from time to time with self-centered acts.

As the artifact's abilities pull material from the Maelstrom, it doesn't function in areas where planar connections are severed.

Activater envision

Trigger You are targeted by a ranged attack from an opponent you can see

Effect You draw a temporary shield of chaotic turbulence with a cerulean flash. You gain a +3 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Activate 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact)

Effect The Cane of the Maelstrom casts a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Hallucinatory Terrain} spell and infuses the illusion with quasi-real substance drawn from the primal chaos of the Maelstrom. Creatures that don't disbelieve the illusion treat structures and terrain created through the spell as though they were real, ascending illusory stairs, becoming trapped by illusory quicksand, and so on. If no creature disbelieves the illusion during its duration, the changes become wholly real and permanent when its duration expires.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Effect The Cane of the Maelstrom casts a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation} spell, except the duration is unlimited and you can create delicate or complex objects by succeeding at an applicable Crafting skill check when you activate this ability.

Cantrip Deck (5-pack).name: Baralho de truque mágico (conjunto com 5 cartas)

Cantrip Deck (Full Pack).description:
In an effort to spread the knowledge of magic as widely as possible, worshippers of Nethys discovered a way to bind cantrips into cards accessible even to non-spellcasters. The deck contains thick parchment cards, each roughly half the size of a playing card. In precise, no-nonsense script, each card simply states the name of its cantrip, color-coded based on its school.

This pack contains 24 cards-one of each cantrip in the Core Rulebook.

Activate 1 or more (envision, Interact)

Effect You envision your desired cantrip, causing its card to rise to the top of the deck, and draw the card. The deck casts that cantrip as a 1st-level spell, with a DC of 15 and a spell attack modifier of +5. The card crumbles into dust as the cantrip takes effect. The activation takes the same number of actions as the cantrip you chose takes to cast.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwZBXN6zBoB9BHXE]{Divine Lance}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]{Know Direction}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{Message}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{Stabilize}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tanglefoot}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{Telekinetic Projectile}

Cape of the Open Sky.description:
This cloth of gold cape was originally gifted to one of Goka's emperors centuries ago. Since then, it has spawned many imitations, which are all alike in that they are dyed with an elaborate seal depicting two drakes flanking Goka's palace and the Seven Dragons Bridge. The beautiful cape grants you a +3 item bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} and to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}. While you wear the cape, the weather (including wind and fog) doesn't affect your movement or vision. Additionally, whenever you fall while wearing the cape of the open sky, the cape automatically casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} on you.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect The cape becomes a pair of golden drake wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.UzSrsR9S2pgMDbbp]{Effect: Cape of the Open Sky}

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per minute

Effect The cloak pushes you onward. You Stride or Fly up to your Speed, but you can move only in a straight line. You gain a +15-foot status bonus to your Speed and fly Speed for this movement.

Celestial Peach (Life).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

When you place the peach into the mouth of an intact corpse that died within the last year, it casts a 10th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} on the corpse.

Celestial Peach (Rejuvenation).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

You gain the effects of 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Neutralize Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease} spells. The peach has a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+27]].

Ceremonial dagger with onyx hilt.name: Adaga Cerimonial com punho de Ônix

Chain Mail.name: Cota de Malha
Chain Mail.description: Uma cota de malha consiste de várias peças de armadura compostas de pequenos anéis de metal unidos formando uma malha protetora. Tipicamente ela inclui uma camisão de malha, calças, um par de proteção para os braços e uma coifa, coletivamente protegendo a maior parte do corpo.

Channel Protection Amulet.name: Amuleto de proteção contra canalização
Channel Protection Amulet.description: Esta pepita de tectito polido é presa em uma gaiola de fios entrelaçados e pendurada em um cordão de seda. Quando usar este amuleto, você adquire resistência 5 contra o dano de magias ferir se for vivo ou contra magias curar se for morto-vivo.

Chatterer of Follies.description:
This heavy +1 striking khakarra is cast from solid steel and plated with pyrite. Metal charms shaped like grinning idols festoon its great arched ring, and during combat, as tiny tendrils of flame fly off the pyrite, these hanging dolls seem to chatter in tune with the clash and din of battle.

Whenever you complete a move action during your turn, choose a creature adjacent to you at the end of your movement. Until the end of your turn, that creature takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves against your enchantment spells and your illusion spells. Any time you cast your enchantment and illusion spells, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} during your move actions for the rest of the turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.mQJk8R0vHzvpTz0e]{Effect: Chatterer of Follies}

Cheetah's Elixir (Greater).name: Elixir do Guepardo (Maior)
Cheetah's Elixir (Greater).description: Os compostos enzimáticos neste elixir fortalecem e estimulam os músculos de suas pernas. Você recebe um bônus de estado de +3 metros em sua Velocidade pela  duração de 1 hora.

Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser).name: Elixir do Guepardo (Menor)
Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser).description: Os compostos enzimáticos neste elixir fortalecem e estimulam os músculos de suas pernas. Você recebe um bônus de estado de +1,5 metros em sua Velocidade pela  duração de 1 minuto.

Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate).name: Elixir do Guepardo (Moderado)
Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate).description: Os compostos enzimáticos neste elixir fortalecem e estimulam os músculos de suas pernas. Você recebe um bônus de estado de +3 metros em sua Velocidade pela  duração de 10 minutos.

Chest.name: Baú
Chest.description: Um baú de madeira pode guardar até 8 volumes de items.

Chronicler Wayfinder.description:
Chronicler wayfinders bear a mystical connection to the Pathfinder Chronicles themselves, granting them the ability to assist in situations where unusual lore is needed by drawing on lore from a particular topic. Each chronicler wayfinder is attuned to a specific Lore skill, chosen at the time of creation. In addition to the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, a chronicler wayfinder has the following activation.

Activate A Envision

Effect You tap into the Pathfinder Chronicles on the chronicler wayfinder's attuned topic, gaining the effects of a Recall Knowledge action with the chosen Lore skill. For the Lore check's modifier, use whichever is better of +12 or your own modifier, using your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained in the attuned Lore skill.

Chrysoberyl symbol of an evil eye.name: Crisoberilo com o símbolo de um Olho Malígno

Clan Dagger.name: Adaga de Clã
Clan Dagger.description: Esta adaga larga é carregada por anões como uma arma, ferramenta e designação de clã. Perder ou ter que entregar uma adaga de clã é considerado uma vergonha para a maioria dos anões.

Climbing Bolt.name: Virote de Escalada
Climbing Bolt.description: A haste deste virote é envolta com barbante fino. Quando o virote atinge uma superfície sólida, o barbante se desenrola e cresce tornando-se uma corda com 15 metros de comprimento, presa na superfície atingida. A corda pode ser solta com uma ação de Interagir e sucesso em um teste de Atletismo CD 20.

Climbing Kit.name: Kit de Escalada
Climbing Kit.description: Esta sacola inclui 15 metros de corda, roldanas, uma dúzia de pitões, um martelo, um gancho de escalada e um conjunto de grampos de ferro. Kits de escalada permitem que você se prenda na parede que estiver Escalando, movendo- -se à metade da Velocidade normal (mínimo de 1,5 metros) mas permitindo que você faça um teste simples CD 5 sempre que obtiver uma falha crítica para evitar uma queda. Você recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo para Escalar enquanto usar um kit de escalada extrema. Um único kit possui material o suficiente para apenas um alpinista; cada alpinista deve possuir seu próprio kit.

Clockwork Cloak.description:
Paper-thin interlocking gears and winding cogs make up this bronze cloak.

Activater Interact

Frequency once per day

Trigger You're struck by a melee attack with a held weapon

Effect The folds of the cloak attempt to divert the attack and catch the weapon in the cloak's gears. Make an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the attacking creature.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect You wrap the cloak around yourself and the winding gears decelerate your body, causing you to enter standby mode. While in standby mode you don't need to eat, drink, or sleep. You remain aware of your surroundings but take a -4 penalty to Perception checks. You can stay in standby mode indefinitely, although your body ages normally. You can leave standby mode as a f . If you do so to initiate combat, you gain a +2 item bonus to your initiative roll.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.3LhreroLRmI4atE6]{Effect: Clockwork Cloak}

Clockwork Helm.description:
Rotating gears cover the outside of this imposing helmet.

In order to function, the device must be wound for 10 minutes once every 24 hours. The clockwork helm has a calming and focusing effect on the mind. If you're affected by a detrimental condition caused by a mental or emotion effect, each round at the beginning of your turn, the gears of the helmet unwind and reduce the value of the condition by 1. This effect works only if the condition's value can normally be reduced by simply waiting; otherwise the helmet has no effect.

Activate2 envision

Frequency once per day
